DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : Vibration use enhance muscle strength development resistance training . Aim : To assess effect add vibration regular resistance training program , use free weight , muscle strength everyday functioning upper limb untrained adult Methods : 60 healthy untrained adult , 30-65 yr , divide two group : experiment control . Training program include 24 session , course 8 week . The experiment group use 1 kg vibrate weight control group use standard 1 kg free weight . Every session include 10-15 min 3-5 standard resistant exercise upper limb . Each subject perform Isokinetic evaluation muscular performance , upper limb , 3 occasion : start program , immediately complete 8-weeks training program 4 week afterwards , check chronic effect training regime . Each subject complete DASH ( Disabilities arm , shoulder hand ) questionnaire 4 occasions- mention one time , complete first 4 week train program , reject development negative effect train program , pain inflammation joint .
DOC.criteria: healthy adult , age 3065 participate resistance training upper limbs regularly unbalanced hypertension cardiovascular disfunction disease pain or/ inflammation neck , shoulder arm pregnant woman
